Case Timeline

Forensic chronology organised into 8 phases, from pre-existing conditions through vindication. Events colour-coded by verification status.

Dec 2021

First Seizure

Nov 2022

Fractures Found

Jan 2023

Covert Diagnosis

Jul 2025

Diagnosis Removed

Status:
Verified
Contradicted
Unverified
Key Event
1
13 Jun 2019 F032

Duplex Ultrasound Shows TOS-Positive Result

Complete flow cessation in distal subclavian artery during provocative manoeuvres. "Positive result" documented.

VERIFIED
Pre-2020

Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome Diagnosed

Chronic pain documented across multiple specialist letters. DEXA scan shows T/Z scores in osteopenic range.

VERIFIED
2
28 Sep 2020 F002

MH1 Referral: Somatisation Framing

GP referral explicitly links "somatisation" to brother's death. No psychiatric assessment conducted.

CONTRADICTED
23 Oct 2020

GP Documents "Same Path as Brother"

Dr Gupta records patient is "on same path as his brother who committed suicide after chronic pain."

CONTRADICTED
04 Aug 2021 F022

MSK Physio Documents GP Dismissal

"issues with GP, as they did not believe his pain and accused him for attention seeking"

VERIFIED
Sep 2021 F001

"Sleeping Pain-Free" Entry

Dr Bulale records patient "sleeping pain-free" - contradicted by MSK physio documenting inability to sleep.

CONTRADICTED
Oct 2021 F042

Pregabalin Drastically Reduced

600mg to 100mg (83% reduction) against BNF guidance for gradual taper. Seizure risk factor.

CONTRADICTED
23 Nov 2021 F027

Pain Clinic Rejects Referral

Patient rejected without being consulted. Discharged because mother mentioned low mood/suicidal concerns.

VERIFIED
3
23 Dec 2021 F023

Witnessed Tonic-Clonic Seizure

5-minute ambulance response (Category 1/2), HR 133 bpm tachycardia, Entonox administered for back pain. "Extremely combative and confused post seizure, held to ground by father."

VERIFIED
24 Dec 2021 F047

A&E Attendance - Back Pain Dismissed

Labelled "soft tissue injury" - no spinal imaging ordered despite EDS and violent seizure mechanism.

CONTRADICTED
4
18 Feb 2022 F024

ED Diagnoses Tonic-Clonic Epilepsy

Imperial ED explicitly confirms "first seizure on 23/12" and diagnoses epilepsy.

VERIFIED
26 Feb 2022

Second Witnessed Seizure

Another witnessed tonic-clonic seizure event.

VERIFIED
22 Mar 2022 F003

Neurology Letter - History Divergence

Dr Karunaratne documents seizure history but does not clearly anchor first seizure to 23 Dec 2021.

VERIFIED
5
Nov 2022 F050

MRI Reveals T5-T8 Vertebral Fractures

11 months after the seizure, imaging finally shows multiple thoracic fractures that explain ongoing pain.

VERIFIED
6
05 Jan 2023 F040

Somatoform Pain Disorder F45.4 Applied

Psychiatric diagnosis coded WITHOUT psychiatric assessment, WITHOUT patient knowledge, and without clinical justification.

CONTRADICTED
7
2023 F031

Pain Clinic Refutes Somatoform Diagnosis

Chelsea & Westminster Pain Clinic: "GP prev told somatic, pain clinic at C&W; felt not somatic."

VERIFIED
2023 F038

Psychiatric Assessment Clearance

Dr Gupta (psychiatrist) finds NO: PTSD, depression, psychosis, personality disorder, OR somatisation disorder.

VERIFIED
17 Oct 2023 F034

Dr Gorrie Recognises Seizure/Fractures

New GP properly recognises 2021 seizure/fracture pattern and refers to orthopaedics.

VERIFIED
10 Jan 2024 F033

UCLH MR Confirms TOS

Dynamic MR shows compression of subclavian artery and vein with arms abducted.

VERIFIED
09 Jun 2025 F036

Doppler Shows Bilateral Subclavian Occlusion

Royal Free ultrasound confirms dynamic vascular compression. At 90Â° abduction: "compressed with no flow."

VERIFIED
22 Jul 2025 F030

Dr Gorrie Removes Somatoform Diagnosis

Marked as INACTIVE: "there were clear causes for his pain." Unusual without psychiatric reassessment.

VERIFIED
Dec 2024 F354

Formal Epilepsy Diagnosis Confirmed

Epilepsy formally diagnosed, validating all prior seizure events.

VERIFIED
8
Jan 2026

Evidence Repository Compiled

200+ findings documented. Case ready for legal review with comprehensive evidence chain.
